hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating modern and high-performance web experiences. I turn ideas into elegant and functional web applications.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: At 26, I made a career change, leaving the restaurant industry to pursue my true passion: web development and programming.
about.paragraph2: Currently enrolled in the Full Stack Web Developer program at OpenClassrooms, I focus on creating modern, high-performance, and user-friendly web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript.
about.paragraph3: My experience in the restaurant industry taught me the value of attention to detail, working under pressure, and delivering exceptional experiences — skills I now apply to development.

bimisushi.title: BIMI SUSHI
bimisushi.description: A sushi restaurant website with online ordering and an admin dashboard.
bimisushi.context: BIMI SUSHI is a sushi restaurant website that allows customers to browse the menu, place orders online, and manage reservations. It also features an admin dashboard that enables staff to manage orders, reservations, and menu items in real time. This project was one of my first, originally built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and later rebuilt in React for better maintainability and performance.
bimisushi.objectives: The main objectives were to create an attractive and user-friendly interface for customers, develop a secure and efficient online ordering system, and provide the restaurant with a comprehensive admin dashboard to manage daily operations.
bimisushi.skills: During this project, I transformed the static site into a modern full-stack architecture, designed REST APIs with full CRUD functionality, handled state and routing on the frontend, and implemented real-time updates using Socket.IO.
bimisushi.results: The website is now responsive and high-performing, offering a seamless experience for both customers and staff. Customers can place orders easily, while the restaurant team can efficiently manage operations through the dashboard.
bimisushi.perspectives: Future improvements could include adding an online payment system and email notifications for orders.

blink.title: Blink
blink.description: A platform for freelancers and small businesses to create and manage invoices.
blink.context: Blink is a platform designed for freelancers and small businesses to quickly generate, organize, and send invoices in a professional and intuitive way. It was developed as a full-stack application using Next.js and MongoDB, providing a modern and scalable solution for invoicing workflows.
blink.objectives: The main goals were to provide an intuitive and responsive interface for users, allow easy invoice creation and tracking, and ensure a smooth experience thanks to the performance benefits of Next.js.
blink.skills: Throughout development, I created modern UI components with Tailwind CSS, managed data persistence, implemented frontend state management and routing, and ensured smooth interaction with backend APIs.
blink.results: Users can now create, organize, and manage invoices easily and efficiently through a responsive and intuitive interface.
blink.perspectives: Future enhancements could include customizable invoice templates and an automated email system for sending invoices.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.description: A property rental platform providing a smooth and intuitive user experience.
kasa.context: Kasa is a property rental platform built as part of my OpenClassrooms training.
kasa.objectives: The objectives were to design a modern interface faithful to the provided mockup, implement full routing with React Router, and ensure a responsive experience across all devices.
kasa.skills: During this project, I structured the React application with reusable components, managed routing and dynamic pages, and implemented conditional rendering in line with the UI mockup.
kasa.results: The platform provides smooth navigation, a user interface faithful to the mockup, and a fully responsive experience on all devices.
kasa.perspectives: Future improvements could include adding advanced search and filtering options for listings.

le-vieux-grimoire.title: Le Vieux Grimoire
le-vieux-grimoire.description: A website for a bookstore specializing in rare and antique books.
le-vieux-grimoire.context: Le Vieux Grimoire is an application developed during my OpenClassrooms training to build a complete backend.
le-vieux-grimoire.objectives: The objectives were to develop a full and secure REST API, manage user authentication with JWT, and enable adding, rating, and managing books.
le-vieux-grimoire.skills: In this project, I created a full Node.js/Express backend using the MVC architecture, handled authentication and security with JWT, and managed a MongoDB database with proper data validation.
le-vieux-grimoire.results: The backend is fully functional and secure, with efficient management of books and users, including a functional rating system.
le-vieux-grimoire.perspectives: Future improvements could include inventory management and an advanced admin interface.

approach.title: My
approach.paragraph1: I like working in a structured yet flexible way. I combine an Agile approach to iterate quickly and test ideas, and I don't hesitate to collaborate or draw inspiration from design to improve the user experience.
approach.paragraph2: Curious and meticulous, I always seek to understand the 'why' before coding. My hospitality experience taught me patience, precision, and the importance of quality experiences — qualities I now apply in my web projects.
approach.paragraph3: I believe clean code and a pleasant interface go hand in hand. My goal is to create high-performance, intuitive, and elegant web applications while keeping a pragmatic and user-centered approach.
